DOC.criteria: At screen visit ( Week 2 ) : Symptoms OAB ≥ 3 month Number urgency episode last 3 day ≥ 3 Based 3day micturition diary prior Visit 1 ( Week 0 ) : Number micturition per day ≥ 8 Number urgency episodes 3 day ≥ 3 At screen visit ( Week 2 ) : Stress predominant factor determine investigator Indwelling catheter practice intermittent selfcatheterization Symptomatic urinary tract infection , chronic inflammation Treatment OAB start , quit change 4 week Diabetic neuropathy At Visit 1 ( Week 0 ) : Patient complete 3day micturition diary accord instruction
